lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Philippine officials will meet major aid donors in May to discuss a 500 mln dlr funding for an extensive land reform program, Finance Minister Jaime Ongpin said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: President Corazon Aquino approved last month the use of an estimated 20 billion pesos from the proceeds of the sale of certain non-performing assets to private companies.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The World Bank has recommended that we meet some time in the second half of May because it is pointless to have that meeting unless the participants have had adequate time to review the documentation," he said.
